definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: Out organization has effectuated the return to their countries of all the political prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 我們的組織已達成遣送所有政治犯回國。

sentences.english: They unbound all the political prisoners after liberation.
sentences.chinese: 解放以後他們釋放了所有的政治犯。

sentences.english: Naypyidaw has also promised the UN General Assembly it will release more political prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 內比都在聯合國大會上承諾將釋放更多的政治犯。

sentences.english: He also oversaw the release of thousands of political prisoners and dissidents.
sentences.chinese: 他還監督政治犯和釋放數千名持不同政見者。

sentences.english: They stormed the jails and they freed political prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 他們衝擊監獄，釋放了政治犯。

sentences.english: He's one of the softies, one of the political prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 他是個軟弱的傢伙，是個政治犯。

sentences.english: Hundreds of political prisoners were pardoned and released.
sentences.chinese: 數百名政治犯被赦免釋放。

sentences.english: Some 2, 100 political prisoners are still languishing in Burmese jails.
sentences.chinese: 大約2100名政治犯還在緬甸監獄裏受折磨。

pinyin: chi2 bu4 tong2 zheng4 jian4 zhe3
